text: O narod moy! Prosite proshcheniya u vashego Tvortsa, chtoby On prostil vam prezhniye grekhi, potom obratites' k Nemu s raskayaniyem. Yesli vy sdelayete eto, On nisposhlot s neba obil'nyy dozhd', eto uvelichit vashi blaga i pribavit sily k vashey sile, kotoroy vy gordites'. Ne otklonyaytes' zhe ot togo, k chemu ya prizyvayu vas, i ne bud'te uporstvuyushchimi greshnikami, kotorykh nepremenno ozhidayet gibel'
